title: Goodday 1.0 – All-in-one social media, email, and task management app
content: Goodday is a single app that manages your emails, social media, notes, tasks, journal, and more. Switching between your apps has never been so easy. No logins, no logouts, and no hassles. title: Wondershare PDF Editor Pro 3.1.0 – Edit and enhance your PDFs
content: Wondershare PDF Editor Pro allows you to edit PDF files effortlessly. title: QuickPick 2.1.2 – Seamless document launcher
content: QuickPick is an application and document launcher designed to feel as if it’s part of Mac OS X itself. Just drag and drop any number of applications or documents into the QuickPick window, and they’ll only ever be a mouse click, flick, or key press away.   QuickPick is a great place to store documents […]

title: s.press 1.0 – JS/CSS/HTML Compressor
content: s.press is a JavaScript, CSS and HTML compressor. title: Slicy 1.1.5 – Turn PSD elements into images for the Web and apps
content: Slicy (was Layer Cake) turns PSD elements into images for the Web and for Apps, simply name your layer groups once and let Slicy do its magic. Bye bye, “Save for Web/Devices”. title: Savings 1.4 – Manage your personal finances
content: Savings is an easy-to-use personal finance application, beautifully designed for your Mac. It has everything you need to get your finance under control, but without the complexity you find in other personal finance apps. title: Tree 1.9.1 – Store ideas and organize info
